title: Discipleship: The 12 Core Foundations
description: Twelve essentials for following Jesus—from grace and new birth to obedience, community, mission, and perseverance.

units.title: The Gospel of Grace (Justification by Faith)
units.summary: Saved by grace through faith; Christ our righteousness.

unlock_scripture_card.title: Righteousness from God
unlock_scripture_card.verse_kjv: Romans 3:24 — Being justified freely by his grace through the redemption that is in Christ Jesus:
unlock_scripture_card.layer: We are declared righteous by grace, not works; Christ's righteousness credited to us.

objectives: Define the gospel of grace and justification by faith.
Rest assurance in Christ's finished work.
reflection_questions: Where do I still try to earn God's favor?
How does justification change how I see myself today?

units.title: Regeneration — New Birth by the Spirit
units.summary: Not just forgiven—made new by the Spirit.

unlock_scripture_card.title: Born from Above
unlock_scripture_card.verse_kjv: Titus 3:5 — Not by works of righteousness which we have done, but according to his mercy he saved us, by the washing of regeneration, and renewing of the Holy Ghost;
unlock_scripture_card.layer: God gives a new heart and new desires; obedience flows from new life.

objectives: Identify new desires the Spirit is forming.
practice: Lectio on John 3:1–8; journal one sentence of response.
reflection_questions: Where do I see signs of new birth?
What old patterns are losing power?

units.title: Adam → Christ & Union with Christ
units.summary: In Adam all die; in Christ we live—united with Him.

unlock_scripture_card.title: From Death to Life
unlock_scripture_card.verse_kjv: 1 Corinthians 15:22 — For as in Adam all die, even so in Christ shall all be made alive.
unlock_scripture_card.layer: Adam's headship brought death; Christ, the last Adam, brings life. Union with Christ is the ground of our new identity and power to obey.

objectives: Understand federal headship and union with Christ.
Connect union to identity and sanctification.
practice: Read Romans 6:3–5; write how union with Christ changes your week.
reflection_questions: Where do I still live 'in Adam'?
How does union with Christ empower obedience?

units.title: Repentance & Faith — The Ongoing Posture
units.summary: Turning from sin to God daily, by grace.

unlock_scripture_card.title: Turn & Believe
unlock_scripture_card.verse_kjv: Mark 1:15 — …repent ye, and believe the gospel.
unlock_scripture_card.layer: Repentance restores joy; faith clings to Christ.

reflection_questions: What is God inviting me to turn from?
How does faith reshape my choices?

units.title: Lordship & Obedience (Faith Working in Love)

unlock_scripture_card.title: Hear and Do
unlock_scripture_card.verse_kjv: James 2:17 — Even so faith, if it hath not works, is dead, being alone.
unlock_scripture_card.layer: We are not saved by works, but saving faith works through love.

objectives: Choose a concrete step of obedience.
practice: Pick one command of Jesus and practice it this week.
reflection_questions: Where is love asking me to act?
What hinders my obedience?

units.title: Scripture — Authority, Meditation, Obedience
units.summary: Rooted in the Word; fruitful in season.

unlock_scripture_card.title: Rooted & Fruitful
unlock_scripture_card.verse_kjv: Joshua 1:8 — …thou shalt meditate therein day and night…
unlock_scripture_card.layer: Meditation leads to obedience; fruit follows rootedness.

reflection_questions: When do I resist the Word?
What habit will keep Scripture central?

units.title: Prayer (and Fasting) — Aligning the Heart

unlock_scripture_card.title: Pray as Jesus Taught
unlock_scripture_card.layer: Prayer cultivates trust; peace guards the heart.

reflection_questions: What changes when I pray first?
Where is God inviting deeper trust?

units.title: The Holy Spirit — Walk, Fruit, Power
units.summary: Indwelling presence for transformation and witness.

unlock_scripture_card.title: Life in the Spirit
unlock_scripture_card.verse_kjv: Galatians 5:16 — This I say then, Walk in the Spirit, and ye shall not fulfil the lust of the flesh.
unlock_scripture_card.layer: The Spirit produces fruit and empowers mission.

practice: Morning surrender prayer to the Spirit.
reflection_questions: Where do I see fruit forming?
What quenches the Spirit in me?

units.title: Identity & Holiness
units.summary: Who we are → how we live.

unlock_scripture_card.title: Set Apart with Purpose
unlock_scripture_card.layer: Identity precedes behavior; holiness flows from belonging.

practice: Replace one lie with truth each day.
reflection_questions: Which identity statement anchors me?
Where do I need renewal?

units.title: Community, Confession, and the Church

unlock_scripture_card.title: Stirring One Another
unlock_scripture_card.verse_kjv: Hebrews 10:24 — …provoke unto love and to good works:
unlock_scripture_card.layer: Isolation shrinks faith; community strengthens obedience.

objectives: Commit to a weekly community rhythm.
reflection_questions: Where do I hide? Why?
How can I encourage someone this week?

units.title: Mission — Witness & Service
units.summary: Share hope and serve like Jesus.

unlock_scripture_card.title: Ready to Answer
unlock_scripture_card.verse_kjv: 1 Peter 3:15 — …be ready always to give an answer…
unlock_scripture_card.layer: Witness is gentle and clear; service reflects Christ.

objectives: Pray for three people by name.
practice: Share a faith conversation or invite.
reflection_questions: What part of my story shows grace?
Who am I praying for?

units.title: Perseverance & Rule of Life (Abide & Continue)
units.summary: Stable rhythms for the long journey.

unlock_scripture_card.title: Abide to Bear Fruit
unlock_scripture_card.verse_kjv: John 15:5 — …for without me ye can do nothing.
unlock_scripture_card.layer: A simple rule helps you continue in Christ through seasons.

objectives: Draft a 4-rhythm rule: Word, Prayer, Community, Mission.
Choose a mentor/group for next steps.
practice: Write & share your rule of life.
reflection_questions: Which rhythms help me abide?
Who will walk with me from here?
